EmailTemplate.description: This is sent to PM and SPM when a severity 1/2/3 incident is reported
EmailTemplate.name: High severity incident notification
EmailTemplate.subject: High severity incident recorded in SF
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hello,
There has been a severity 1 or 2 health & safety incident recorded in Salesforce.
To view the relevant incident, please see {!Incident__c.Link}.
This is a standard email, sent automatically whenever a severity 1 or 2 health & safety incident is recorded.
